TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectorAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 提供有关活动设计器之间的连接器的信息，辅助性应用程序使用这些信息为残障用户调整应用程序 UI。

span.span: Provides information on connectors between activity designers that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's UI for users with impairments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 使用任意形式的布局时，活动设计器类使用 类相互连接。When using a freeform layout, activity designers are connected to each other using the class. 类用于提供有关活动设计器之间的这些连接器的信息，辅助性应用程序使用这些信息调整应用程序 UI。The class is used to provide information on these connectors between activity designers that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's UI. 此外，当从 派生类时，此类还可以用于自定义绘制。Also, you can use this class to customize the drawing when you derive a class from .

summary.span: 获取此辅助性对象的角色。

span.span: Gets the role of this accessible object.
One of the values of AccessibleRole.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AccessibleRole` 属性描述对象是哪一种用户界面元素。The `AccessibleRole` property describes what kind of user interface element an object is. 如果无法确定控件的角色，则 `AccessibleRole` 属性将设置为 `Default`。If the control's role cannot be determined, the `AccessibleRole` property is set to `Default`.
